amendatorysection.catchline: Absence of judge; adjournment until next regular term.
amendatorysection.para: If the judge does not appear by 5 p.m. in the afternoon of the fourth day, the court shall stand adjourned until the next regular term.

annotation.para: In adjourning term, clerk acts in a ministerial capacity. Parrott v. Wolcott, 75 Neb. 530, 106 N.W. 607 (1906).
